Action.Description: â– For usage issues, check the [README] first â–
Â· Report unexpected issues or suggestions to improve MissFisher.
Â· Before reporting, ensure the issue occurs in the latest version.
â– Some commands can omit the Echo prefix (e.g. /mf) â–
See Wiki for Angex syntax (Temporarily available in Chinese only).
Â·Start with specified Big Fish type: (case-insensitive)
Bring 99+ Plump Worms/Krill/Ragworm. Bluefish mode requires other bait.
Â· Achievement mode refers to achievements that require catching specific types of fish in
Â· If route IDs are [Balloon CatchersÂ¹] [Sticking it to the MantaÂ²],
'achiev2' refers to [Sticking it to the MantaÂ²].
Â· Start with specified Diadem's targets: (case-insensitive)
Upon entering the Diadem, activate any Diadem Mode to obtain fishing spot intel.
Corresponding Diadem's Targets > Diadem's Achievement Name > Required Bait
Â· SkyBuiG2 > The Height of Angling > Diadem Hoverworm
Â· SkyBuiG3 > Fishers of a Feather > Diadem Crane Fly
Â· SkyBuiG4 > An Ode to Angling > Diadem Crane Fly, Diadem Balloon Bug
Â· SkywardPt > Skyward Rod > Diadem Crane Fly, Diadem Balloon Bug
Â· SBGreen > Dauntless Treader > Versatile Lure, Diadem Crane Fly, Diadem Balloon Bug, Diadem Red Balloon
Suggested order of completion: SBGreen > SkyBuiG2&SkyBuiG3 > SkywardPt(SkyBuiG4)
Â· Some features ignore pause (e.g. preset switching).
Â· Manually trigger sync in 'More' group.
Â· Positive values move HUD to bottom-right.
